title: What questions should I ask my child's kindergarten teacher? - Quora

response.answer_text: One question I would be sure to ask would be: “Does my child seem happy to be here? Does he/she mingle with the other children well?” Another important area: What are my child’s strengths and weaknesses? How can I best help him/her at home? Then ask about what the teacher sees at school regarding work habits. Always end by thanking the teacher for his/her working with your child, and remind them to contact you any time, with amy problem.

Nothing. You can’t have 18 sets of parents constantly bombarding the teacher with questions. Instead, you will get reports from the teacher through the school. Read those closely and quietly monitor the maturation process in your children as they play and socialize around you at home.
